text: The Reinas de Belleza del Paraguay 2018 pageant was held at the Resort Yacht y Golf Club Paraguayo on August 24th, 2018, to select Paraguayan representatives to major beauty pageants: Miss Universe, Miss World, Miss Earth, among others. It was broadcast live on RPC. There were two groups of candidates: Miss Universe/Earth candidates; and Miss World candidates. ==Results== *Miss Universe/Miss Earth group María Belén irá al Miss Universo 2018 www.lanacion.com.py {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Final Results ! Contestant |- | Miss Universe Paraguay 2018 | * border Cordillera - Belén Alderete |- | Reina Hispanoamericana Paraguay 2018 | * border Asunción - Ana Livieres |- | Miss Earth Paraguay 2018 | * border Amambay - Larissa Dominguez |- | Miss Global City Paraguay 2018 | * border San Pedro - Karina Da Silva |- | Vicereine Universe Paraguay 2018 | * border Alto Paraná - Violeta Van Humbeck |- | 1st Runner-up | * border Caazapá - Naida Espinola |- | 2nd Runner-up | * border Canindeyú - Evelyn Andrade |} *Miss World group {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Candidate |- | border Amambay || Lilian Daniela Arce Esquivel |- | border Asunción || Fabiana Maria Mareco Alvarez |- | border Caazapá || Maxima Mabel Ferreira Ledezma |- | border Canindeyú || Carmen Luana Perez Gomez |- | border Central || Alisson Rebeca Martinez Almada |- | border Itapúa || Maquenna Gaiarín Díaz |- | border San Pedro || Evelin Amalia Baruja Arce |} ==Judges== The twelve judges for the final telecast include: * Gloria de Limpias, president of Promociones Gloria * Sally Jara, Miss Universe Paraguay 2014 * Pablo Damota, General Manager of Yacht y Golf Club Paraguayo * Luis Vellasai, architect, set designer, actor * Bettina Barboza, Miss Universe Paraguay 1995 * Egni Eckert, Miss Universe Paraguay 2012 * Marcos Margraf,, director of Margraf Dental Center * César Fretes, president of One 2 One * Guillermo Fridman, professional photographer, make-up artist for Maybelline Paraguay * Marina Mora, Miss Perú 2001 * Luz Marina González de Durán, Miss Universo Paraguay 1988 * Carsten Pfau, president of Agriterra ==See also== *Miss Paraguay *Miss Universe 2018 *Miss World 2018 *Miss International 2018 *Miss Earth 2018 ==External links== *Promociones Gloria, holder of the franchises. *Reinas de Belleza del Paraguay Facebook Page ==References== Category:2018 beauty pageants Category:2018 in Paraguay 2018 Category:August 2018 events in South America
